          <title>
            <string language="sl">Začni dan z nasmehom na obrazu - igra</string>
            <string language="en">Start your day with the smile - play</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beginnen Sie Ihr Tag mit dem Lächeln - Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commencez votre jour avec le sourire - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comece seu dia com o sorriso - jogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inizi il vostro giorno con il sorriso - gioco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχίστε την ημέρα σας με το χαμόγελο - παιχνίδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comience su día con la sonrisa - juego</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Igra:SONCE, JEZA, RADOST, namenjena je učencem, da bi razumeli POMEN POZITIVNEGA razmišljanja.</string>
            <string language="en">Play about positive thinking - sun, joy, laughter, ...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dramatizacija</string>
            <string language="en">dramatization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">smeh</string>
            <string language="en">laugh</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen Sie über das denkende Positiv - Sonne, 
Freude, Gelächter...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jouez au sujet du positif pensant - le soleil, 
joie, rire...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogue sobre o positivo que pensa - sol, alegria, 
laughter...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioc circa il positive che pensa - sole, la gioia,
laughter...</string>
          </description>

γέλιο...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegue sobre el positivo que piensa - sol, 
alegría, risa...</string>
